value.title: How to Sync Two Slicers on the Same Page in Power BI?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will talk about Advanced Properties for the Sync Slicer in Power BI. Sometimes we have a scenario where want functionality that if we select some value from the slicer the same value should be selected from another slicer on the same page. At that time how we can achieve this

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. value.title: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server  In this video, I walk through the steps to create your Power BI Report in order to publish it to Power BI Report Server. This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. Marco helps to break down a DAX measure and show how you can see the results as you build it up to find where the problem is.  SQL BI https://sqlbi.com  DAX Formatter https://www.daxformatter.com/

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark

This uses some new features in Power BI Desktop as well as using DAX Studio to get further insights. value.title: Append vs Merge in Power BI and Power Query
value.excerpt: Combining two queries in Power Query or in Power BI is one of the most basic and also essential tasks that you would need to do in most of data preparation scenarios. There are two types of combining queries; Merge, and Append. Database developers easily understand the difference, but the majority of

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.
